text:
Tujhse bs abhi last me hi interaction hua bhai jitna bhi hua. Tere maje lete hue aur tere sath kisi aur ki lete hue bohot maja aaya. Aise hi hmesha funny rehna. My best wishes are always with you.
p.s. bowl dekh ke bat chalaya kar bhai :D:D:D
author: Nikhil  Kumar

text: I guess we never had too much of interaction with each other, shayad hum dono ka nature alag tha ya group alag alag the. Par jo bhi ho Bhai, I have nothing but respect and love for you. I admire your hardwork and perseverance, hmesha yahi nature rakhna life me. My well wishes are always with you.
author: Nikhil  Kumar

text: Hii Annu. You are such an amazing guy. We are so different but still I always loved to have discussion with you. I have nothing but respect for you. Aise hi machaate raho. My well wishes are always with you Brother. <3
author: Nikhil  Kumar

text:
Hello Boiiii. You were the first friend I made here at IITK. sath me chem lab me jo maje karte the Bhai, copy kar karke jo lab report likhi hmne ;p sab alag hi level tha Bhai. Tumhari vajah se first year itna maje me gujra.
Ab aage bhi tum aise hi machaate rehna. Meri best wishes hmesha mere Bhai ke sath hai <3
author: Nikhil  Kumar

text:
Bhai I am lucky ki Pawan ke rehte hue mujhe tujhse aur Manoj se milne ka mauka mila. You are one of the chill and fun person I have seen. 
Tere saare vlogs dekhta hua Bhai upload hote hi. Tum aise hi bakchodi pelte raho, mere well wishes hmesha mere Bhai ke sath hain. <3
P.S. Abhi tak ek bhi video me meri shakal tak na aayi hai, bc pawan ko bi leliya vlog me mujhse pehle :(
author: Nikhil  Kumar

text:
One of the most genuine people I have met here at IITK. BC first year se hi pata chal gaya tha, ye launda apne sath rehne wala hai ab 4 saal tak ;p
From first time G@nja to Dehradun trip, from studying for shitty civil courses to sleeping on the chair next to you in the hospital ( kitna tut-te fut-te rehte ho bhai ;p) I always felt like I was with my brother.
Hmesha aise hi chill karte rehna. Never change your amazing attitude. 
My best wishes are with my Brother <3
Brothers Forever
author: Nikhil  Kumar

text: HEY STUD. TA ki lab me apne bhai ke sath kaam karke maja aaya. You are one of the nicest guy I met here at IITK. Hmesha aise hi machate raho Bhai <3
author: Nikhil  Kumar

text:
Dekh... Tumhari aur meri baat na ho paayi, isme 50% galti meri hai aur baki 50% tumhari. Mujhe hmesha dar lagta tha ki kahi galat judge na karlo, aur Tum thoda shy ho ( thoda nahi bohot jyda)
Mujhe sahi me accha laga ki hmne ye 4th year wala course le liya sath me, isi bahaane tumse baate start hui. 
I really respect the way you pursue things and always excel at them too. Aise hi tod-fod machati raho. Mast Phd karo, aur please khadoos proff mat ban-na tum ( although probability kafi high hai ) :D
That's it. Apna khyal rakho. Apni topi ka khyaal rakho. Agli class me bhi wahi topi pahen-na :D 
Milte hn dobara, aise hi, fir kisi course me. Tab tak ke liye.....BYE
author: Nikhil  Kumar

text:
Yo DOPA. Kabhi C5 me bhi study material supply kar diya kar bro, sara akele akele dekhta rehta hai.
You are one of the most down to earth guy I have met at IITK. I always find it so easy to talk to you.  Gym jaana mat chodna. Aur itte PYAAR aur PATIENCE se merko poker sikhaane ke liye thank you Bhai :D 
P.S. Teri bahen ki shadi me bula le Bhai plis ;p
author: Nikhil  Kumar

text:
Mere Bhai
Tumhare saath itne experience hai... kya kahu. Civil ke course me magai se lekr Dehradun ki bike trip tak... time kaise gujra pata hi nahi chala. Merko to aaj bhi lagta hai tujhe dekhkar, wing me G@*ja laane ka idea sahi nahi tha bc. Maine tumhare haramipan ko underestimate kar liya tha ;p ( I am sorry)
Mai chahta hu life me hum jab bhi mile to aise hi chill karte hue, maje karte hue mile. Mere mann me tere liye bohot sara pyaar hai, aur thodi se respect. Mere liye tu hmesha TOPPER hi rahega ( bohot muskil se likha hai ye ;p)
Sacchi btata hu Bhai, tu nahi hota to civil engineering krne ke G**nd fat jaati meri :D 
Apna dhyan rakhna mere Bhai. Hmesha aise hi chill rehna.
Brothers forever <3
author: Nikhil  Kumar

text:
Mere Bhai pata nahi hum kaise mile, kaha mile... par tujhse milne ke bad ek chij sure ho gayi thi, BC YE LAUNDA EKDUM APNE JAISA HAI ( + tu bakchodi mujhse thodi jyada karta hai)
Mai hamesha appreciate karta hu bhai ki jo tere dil me hota tha, wahi samne bolta tha. It was an amazing experience to meet brothers like you at my IITK journey. 
Hmesha aise hi chill rehna Bhai. Mere dil me to tu hmesha rahega hi <3
author: Nikhil  Kumar

text:
I don't know Dost kaise bante hain, dosti ki shuruwat kaise hoti hai... but agar koi dost banna hota hai to bs ban jaata hai. #Ekdum soulmate ki tarah
Mujhe to jis din se mila us din se aajtk mere liye Gullu hi hai, aur aage bhi Gullu hi rahega. Tere sath us type ki dosti hai Bhai ki agar ek saal bad bhi bat kar rahe hain to lagta hai bc ye to wahi dost hai. 
Tujhe first year se lekr abhi tak bohot change hote hue dekha hai. I always loved to discuss any topic with you because I genuinely cared what you wanted to say, aur bc har bar sach me kuch accha hi lagta tha. Life me aajtk tere sath hi sabse positive discussions hue hain, jaha ladai result ko prove karne ki nahi balki kuch seekhne ki hoti thi. 
Aage bhi life me yahi chill attitude banaye rakhna. Mere liye tu chote bhai jaisa hai aaj, aur hmesha rahega bhi. Agli bar milenge to teri body banwa dunga ;p mere bina nahi banegi vo :D:D:D
Hmesha Khush reh mere Bhai
#Stud_hai_mera_bhai
author: Nikhil  Kumar

text:
Don't remember kab mile...yad nahi kab dosti hui, Bs ek chij yaad hai ki tere sath aajtk koi bhi ladai ya bura experience nahi raha. I always loved to spend time with you Pradeep.
Poker, patte aur cricket hmesha yaad rahenge. Mere liye sbse accha experience tha jab pata chala Bhai ki intern lag gayi hai. Dil se bolta hu bhai... Itni khushi apni kamyabi pe nahi hoti, jitni tere liye aur apne wing walo ki succeas pe hoti hai.
Apna khyal rakho Mere Bhai. Milte rahenge. 
â¤ï¸
author: Nikhil  Kumar

text:
Hii Sahil
First year me IITK me aane ke baad you were among the first person whom I met. First year as roommates was a nice experience.
Ek chij to clear hai bhai, apan dono ka nature ek north pole aur south pole jaisa hai. Hum jaise logo ko roommates bana koi aag se khelne se kam nahi hai ðŸ˜ But I am glad ki overall we had a nice time together.
Poker, bluff and Mafia... I will miss. Good luck for everything ahead Bhai â¤ï¸
author: Nikhil  Kumar

text:
Hii Bhailu... it was amazing to spend so much of my time at IITK with you. Chahe vo market ka haal puchte hue ho ya poker khelte hue. I genuinely consider you one of the most sensible person I met at IITK. Hmesha aise hi rehna mere bhai. My best wishes are always with you. <3
P.S. Maine abhi tak demat bhi nahi banaya hai :D:D:D
author: Nikhil  Kumar

text:
Meri Jaan Shashi
Tu kitna important hai Bhai mere liye, ye mai samjha nahi sakta yaar. First year me jis din tujhe dekha tha IITK me, aisa laga jaise Mera Bhai mil gaya ho. College rehte hue hmesha ye feeling rehti thi ki bc kuch bhi ho jaaye, mera bhai hai yaha. 
12th class me apni kabhi baat nahi ho paayi, par me sach me lucky hu Bhai ki mujhe tu yaha pe mila. Yaha aakr sach me tujhse ek Bhai jaisa rishta bana. Tujhse dosti aisi hai ki chahe ek saal baad bhi milta hu to lagta hai ye to mera wahi Yaar hai <3
Bhai hmesha aise hi chill rehna. Apne Bhai ki success ko mai apni success manta hu. Aise hi aage badhte reh mere Bhai. My best wishes are always with you.
Meri life ke 'most amazing people'  ki list me tu top pe rahega Bhai hmesha ;p
Brothers Forever
author: Nikhil  Kumar

text:
Bhai kaise ho? Tumse aajtk jitni bhi baat hui hmesha election commision related :D:D:D 
You are one of the most genuine people I have met here at IITK. Hmesha aise hi raho bhai. UPSC ki taiyari acche karo, jis din tumhara clear ho gaya to roj mere phones expect karna e.g. Bhai yaha is police wale ne pakad liya hai, ek bar bat karna :D:D:D 
P.S.1 Meri well wishes hmesha mere bhai ke sath hai. life me aage badhte raho <3
P.S. 2 Anti-establishment aadmi to tum ho bhai ;p
author: Nikhil  Kumar

text:
Yo Bro. Hum log kabhi treat ke alawa sath me ghumne nahi jaa paaye, agli bar milenge to ye streak todna hai. I always love the passion with which you pursue things. Hmesha aisa hi nature rakhna.
Aur kab tak single rahega bhai, ab to Bhabhi dede hmko ;p
author: Nikhil  Kumar
